text: Cun Muso xasmginu anduhnok nazdi qavmi xud ʙozgast (zero Alloh uro ogoh namud, ki qavmat dar fitnae muʙtalo sudand va onhoro Somiri ʙa zalolat ʙurd), guft: «Dar naʙudani man ci ʙad conisini karded. Caro ʙar farmoni Parvardigori xud sitoʙ varzided?» Va lavhahoro ʙar zamin afkand va muji sari ʙarodarasro giriftu ʙa sui xud kasid. Horun guft: Ej pisari modaram, in qavm maro za'if sumurdand va nazdik ʙud, ki maro ʙikusand, pas gumon maʙar, ki man kutohi varzidaam, dusmanonro xursand makun va maro dar sumori sitamkorone, ki xilofi amri tuand va parastisi gusola kardaand, qaror madeh!»
